mdRecord.dcterms:description: This handwritten letter, beautifully printed out, is begun with "Hello Everybody," and is signed "Yours, Walker." The letter is dated December 26, 1941 and much of the content centers around Christmas. The stationery's letterhead is United States Air Corps, Maxwell Field, Alabama. The envelope is addressed to Mr. and Mrs. C. M. Wood and Family, Blandome, Lexington, Va. with "Tucker St." added at the bottom of the envelope. The postmark is Montgomery Ala., DEC 27, 1941.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: From Walker to the Woods Family, December 26, 1941 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Armed Forces
Christmas
Friendship
Families
